name: Aidan Richardson
title: Computer Science Student
description:
Hi, I'm Aidan, an enthusiastic computer scientist with strong interests in data science, web development, and cyber security. I'm currently in the final year of my BEng in Computer Science at the University of York. At university I have developed an appreciation for using data to solve real-world problems and hope to apply this in the workplace.

I thrive in the fast-moving world of technology, where I'm constantly learning new topics and skills. I learn quickly and have strong problem-solving skills which I apply through both academic work and personal projects. Iâ€™ve recently started sharing my projects on GitHub, hoping they can inspire and assist others.

I have experience working in IT support which has strengthened my communication, teamwork, and leadership skills, as well as my ability to explain complex concepts clearly and effectively.

After completing my degree I aspire to apply my skills on projects that make a meaningful impact and help others.

projects.title: What's Playing?
